main: S1 and S2 consume up to 10 {status:BloodDinner} to apply 1 stack of {status:BloodArmorMeursault} per 5 consumed to himself and an ally. Prioritizes La Manchaland identities and higher kindred Bloodfiends, and gives an additional stack if it targets a La Manchaland identity. Gains {status:Laceration} instead if he can't consume {status:BloodDinner}.
S3 also grants {status:BloodArmorMeursault} to himself and Reson allies, and grants more on a {keyword:Lust} Reson.

Units with {status:BloodArmorMeursault} consume 1 stack to heal 10% of the damage it deals when attacking. On {keyword:Lust} Reson, it heals half that amount, but does not lose a stack. For {sinner:5} himself, having {status:BloodArmorMeursault} also gives him {status:AttackUp} and {status:DefenseUp} at 3 stacks and {status:Agility} at 4 stacks.

Any La Manchaland identity at 5 {status:BloodArmorMeursault} gains 1 stack of {status:FocusOnActing} every turn, giving all their skills Final Power and damage per stack. 1 stack is lost per turn if the unit loses its entire {status:BloodArmorMeursault} stack or when using their S3.

At 5 {status:BloodArmorMeursault}, his S3 consumes all 5 stacks to use S3-2 instead. S3-2 applies additional {status:BloodArmorMeursault} to Reson allies and has 3 atk weight. Every target staggered, broken, or killed recovers 1 {status:BloodArmorMeursault}. Both versions of S3 inflict {status:ParadeConcentration} and heals {sinner:5} based on damage dealt. {status:ParadeConcentration} increases damage taken from {keyword:Lust} skills and La Manchaland identities.
other: La Manchaland identities with 5 {status:BloodArmorMeursault} gains the ability to consume all 5 stacks to recover from stagger.
If his passive is active, having {status:FocusOnActing} lets him inflict {status:ParadeConcentration} on hit.
Heals himself for 30% of his max HP when below 30% HP once, but needs to hit an enemy with {status:Laceration} to trigger it.
Buffs his own and {identity:10911}'s S3s with +15% damage if both are active.

1051301.desc:
Combat Start: if this unit has [BloodArmorMeursault], gain the following effects based on Stack:
- At 3+ Stack: gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseUp]
- At 4+ Stack: gain 1 [Agility] next turn

On Hit against enemies with [Laceration]: if this unit has less than 30% HP, heal 30% HP (once per Encounter; rounded down)
1051301.name: 'Bloodied, Masked, and as Blood Commands'

1051302.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will rise above the surface.
1051302.name: Bloodfeast

1051303.desc:
Turn Start: the following effects activate for La Manchaland Identities with max [BloodArmorMeursault] Stack
· Gain 1 [FocusOnActing]
· When Staggered due to damage, recover from Stagger; then, consume all [BloodArmorMeursault] on self (once per Stage per Identity; unless it's a forced Stagger)

If The Princess of La Manchaland Rodion is on the field, she and The Prince of La Manchaland Meursault both deal +15% damage with their Skill 3 (including Empowered Skills)
1051303.name: Responsibility of a Former Prince

1051311.desc:
Combat Start: if this unit has [BloodArmorMeursault], gain the following effects based on Stack:
- At 3+ Stack: gain 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp]
- At 4+ Stack: gain 2 [Agility] next turn

Combat Start: if this unit has [FocusOnActing], inflict 1 [ParadeConcentration] On Hit against enemies (2 times per turn; including E.G.O Skills)

On Hit against enemies with [Laceration]: if this unit has less than 30% HP, heal 30% HP (once per Encounter; rounded down)
1051311.name: 'Bloodied, Masked, and as Blood Commands'

1051321.desc: For the turn, multiply the amount of [BloodDinner] generated by 1.5 (2 times per Encounter; rounded down)
1051321.name: Flood the Chalice

data.desc:
[WhenUse] On self and 1 ally with the lowest max HP: consume up to 10 [BloodDinner] and apply 1 [BloodArmorMeursault] for every 5 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed (once per turn; excludes allies with max Stack)
- Prioritizes <La Manchaland> and <Bloodfiend>(Higher Kindred) allies
- If the affected ally is from <La Manchaland>, this unit applies 1 additional [BloodArmorMeursault]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration]
data.name: March Conductor

data.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 40% of the HP damage dealt (max 50 per Skill)
[BeforeUse] At 5 [BloodArmorMeursault], activate "Ouvertüre" instead
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 [BloodArmorMeursault] to self and (highest Reson.) allies (2 times per turn; up to 4 allies; prioritizes <La Manchaland> first, and <Bloodfiend>(Higher Kindreds) second; excludes allies with max Stack)
[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, increase [BloodDinner] by additional 20 (once per turn)
data.name: Let us wear the coagulated mantle of blood.

data.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 40% of the HP damage dealt (max 80 per Skill)
[BeforeUse] At 5 [BloodArmorMeursault], activate "Ouvertüre" instead
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +10% damage for every 2 [Laceration] Count on target (max 40%)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 [BloodArmorMeursault] to self and (highest Reson.) allies (2 times per turn; up to 4 allies; prioritizes <La Manchaland> first, and <Bloodfiend>(Higher Kindreds) second; excludes allies with max Stack)
- If it was a Lust Reson., apply 2 [BloodArmorMeursault] to 2 allies with the lowest max HP as well
[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, increase [BloodDinner] by additional 20 (once per turn)
data.name: Let us wear the coagulated mantle of blood.

data.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] To 2 allies, including this unit, apply 5 [Laceration] and activate it once; then, reduce their [Laceration] Count by 1 (once per turn; prioritizes allies with the most [BloodArmorMeursault]; does not activate for Higher Kindreds; this damage does not reduce the allies' HP below 1)
[WinDuel] Gain 1 [BloodArmorMeursault] (2 times per turn)
data.name: Coagulation

descs: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [BloodArmorMeursault] next turn for every target this Skill's damage Staggered, Part Broke, or defeated (max 3)

data.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 50% of the HP damage dealt (max 85 per Skill)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +2 for every 3 [Laceration] on the main target (max 8)
[WhenUse] Deal +5% damage for every 2 [Laceration] Count on the main target (max 20%)
[WhenUse] Apply 2 [BloodArmorMeursault] to (highest Reson.) other allies (max 4 allies; prioritizes <La Manchaland> first, and <Bloodfiend>(Higher Kindreds) second; excludes allies with max Stack)
[EndSkill] Consume all [BloodArmorMeursault] on self
[EndSkill] If this Skill defeated a target, additionally increase [BloodDinner] by 10 for every target defeated by this Skill (once per turn)
data.name: Ouvertüre

descs: - At 2+ [FocusOnActing], also inflict 2 [ParadeConcentration] to 1 of the targets (once per turn)
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [BloodArmorMeursault] next turn for every target this Skill's damage Staggered, Part Broke, or defeated (max 3)
